description:
The United Healthcare ChildrenGÇÖs Foundation (UHCCF) is a 501(c)(3) charitable organization that provides medical grants to help children gain access to health-related services not covered, or not fully covered, by their parentsGÇÖ commercial health insurance plan.

Families can receive up to $5,000 annually per child ($10,000 lifetime maximum per child), and do not need to have insurance through United Healthcare to be eligible.

name: UNITED HEALTHCARE CHILDREN'S FOUNDATION, INC.
